title: Toggle
summary: Toggles the visiblity of content on the page.

variants.title: Default to Open
variants.name: open
variants.note: Set `aria-expanded='true'` on the toggling element to default the disclosed element state to visible. Note that will function without the corresponding `aria-hidden` attribute on the disclosed element.

variants.title: Persistent
variants.name: persist
variants.note: `data-persist` prevents the toggle target from closing upon interaction, when `esc` is pressed, or the user clicks/taps outside the target element.

variants.title: Persistent Across Pages
variants.name: history
variants.note: `data-session` will persist the toggle state across pages using `localStorage`, with the specified value used as the `localStorage` key .
